controls.id: string - unique ID of the control
controls.name: string - name of the control

controlFamily.id: string - unique ID of the control family
controlFamily.name: string - name of the control family
controlFamily.description: string - description of the control family

ruleEvaluations.id: string - unique id of the rule
ruleEvaluations.name: string - name of the rule
ruleEvaluations.lastRun: dateTime - last time the rule was run

resources.id: string - unique id of the evluated resource
resources.name: string - name of the evalutated resource
resources.system: string - system the evaluated resource is deployed on
resources.region: string - region the evaluated resource is located in
resources.result: string - result of rule execution. Can be COMPLIANT or NOT_COMPLIANT

evidence.collectedDate: dateTime - date the evidence was collected
evidence.system: string - system the evidece was collected from
evidence.collectionType: string - how the evidence was collected. Can be AUTOMATED or MANUAL
evidence.url: string - link to the evidence object
evidence.evidenceType: string - filetype of evidence, so we know how to display and process it

auditStatus.status: string - can be COMPLIANT, PARTIAL, NON_COMPLIANT
auditStatus.lastUpdatedTimestamp: dateTime - time at which this evidence was last evaluated
auditStatus.auditor_validation: string - signed hash to validate auditor
